SELECT fgcno,fc.price,fc.fgno,account,fc.ops,fg.title,fg.brand,fg.delivery , fgi.img ,fg.price as gPrice , fgo.ea as max FROM f_goods_cart fc JOIN f_goods fg ON fc.fgno = fg.fgno LEFT JOIN (SELECT fgno, MAX(img) AS img FROM f_goods_img GROUP BY fgno) fgi ON fc.fgno = fgi.fgno LEFT JOIN f_goods_option fgo ON fc.fgno=fgo.fgno AND fc.ops=fgo.ops WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY fgcno DESC
